```{python}
from ipyleaflet import Map, basemaps, Marker

center = [33.4484, -112.0740]
zoom = 9

m = Map(basemap=basemaps.OpenStreetMap.Mapnik, center=center, zoom=zoom)

marker = Marker(location=center, draggable=False)
m.add(marker)
```
